meta.description: Reviews & Comments: It's a common supposition that childhood vaccines can cause conditions like autism or attention deficit. Our expert debunks this widespread myth by reporting on what research has shown.
meta.keywords: Reviews & Comments: Myths About ADHD,Asperger's Syndrome,ADHD Causes, Myths About ADHD, Asperger`s Syndrome, ADHD Causes, Expert Column

title: Reviews
cleaned_text: The evidence is clear: Vaccines are not a cause cause of autism spectrum disorders or ADHD. Major studies have shown this. It is true that there are more vaccines now for young children than in the past, and some cases of autism don’t materialize until the second year of life. In such cases, a family […]
